vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate the 125th Year Anniversary of the Godman Guild Association
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize and Celebrate the 125th Year Anniversary of the Godman Guild Association
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, it is Godman Guild Association’s mission to provide programs that enhance the social and economic mobility of individuals and families in Central Ohio. The Guild has been proudly serving the Columbus community for over 125 years; and
 
WHEREAS, the Godman Guild Association has been an integral part of the fabric of our community since its inception, contributing immeasurably to the welfare, culture, and prosperity of the City of Columbus; and
 
WHEREAS, the unwavering commitment of the Godman Guild Association has positively impacted the lives of countless residents through educational programs and workforce development services. The Guild also provides a nature escape at Camp Mary Orton, to further their mission of uplifting the social and economic mobility of individuals and families in our region; and
 
WHEREAS, the Godman Guild Association has continually fostered collaboration, innovation, and inclusion, embodying the values that define the spirit of the City of Columbus; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate 125th Year Anniversary of the Godman Guild Association.
